SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct(b.ppr_id) from pr_products_per_client_vw a inner join producten_per_relatie b on b.ppr_relatienummer =a.ppr_relatienummer and b.ppr_productnummer =a.ppr_productnummer and b.ppr_volgnr_per_product=a.ppr_volgnr_per_product inner join producten g on g.pr_productnummer =a.ppr_productnummer and g.pr_opbouw_uitkering_ind='O' where a.ppr_relatienummer >=~1 and a.ppr_relatienummer<=~2 and a.ppr_productnummer>=~4 and a.ppr_productnummer<=~5 :3 and a.ppr_status >0 and a.ppr_status <9 and ( b.ppr_einddatum='00000000' or b.ppr_einddatum is null or to_date(b.ppr_einddatum,'YYYYMMDD') >trunc(sysdate) )
